original_prompt: Extract named entities and classify the tokens a under one of the following labels [I-LOC, B-ORG, O, B-PER, I-PER, I-MISC, B-MISC, I-ORG, B-LOC]. The format should be ["Token": "India", "NER_tag": "B-LOC", ..., ...]
optimized_prompt:
<instructions>
    Extract named entities from the given text and classify each entity under one of the following labels: [B-PER, I-PER, B-ORG, I-ORG, B-LOC, I-LOC, B-MISC, I-MISC, O]. 
    For each identified entity, output in the specified format.
  </instructions>
  <steps>
    1. Read the input text carefully to identify named entities.
    2. Classify each identified entity according to the provided labels.
    3. Format the output as an array of objects, ensuring each object contains:
       - `"Token"`: The named entity found in the text.
       - `"NER_tag"`: The corresponding label for that entity.
  </steps>
  <example>
    Input: `["EU rejects German call to boycott British lamb."]`
    Output: `["Token": "EU", "NER_tag": "B-ORG", "Token": "German", "NER_tag": "B-LOC", "Token": "British", "NER_tag": "B-LOC"]`
  </example>
